summary: I HAVE HAD TO REPLACE THE  BRAKE PRESSURE DIFFERENTIAL DEACTIVATION SWITCH.  THIS WAS LEAKING BRAKE FLUID IN THE ENGINE COMPARTMENT.  THIS LEAK HAS CAUSED MY CRUISE CONTROL TO FAIL, AND NOW I HAVE INTERMITTENT PROBLEMS WITH THE ABS CONTROL UNIT.  I BELIEVE THIS IS A FIRE HAZARD AND A DESIGN FLAW.  PLEASE LET ME KNOW IF  NHTSA IS LOOKING INTO THIS ISSUE.  MY CAR IS A 2000 FORD WINDSTAR. *TR
